abstract: Morgan De Sanctis (Italian pronunciation: [ˈmorɡan dɛ ˈsantis]; born 26 March 1977) is an Italian footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Serie A side A.S. Roma.De Sanctis played six matches for the Italy national football team, his international opportunities limited by Gianluigi Buffon. He was, however, included in squads for Euro 2008, the 2010 FIFA World Cup and Euro 2012.
